summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene refer to the same compound, 1,3-butadiene, which is classified as a group 1 carcinogen. The text discusses the carcinogenic risks associated with 1,3-butadiene exposure, particularly in relation to refinery emissions. The terms are used interchangeably, indicating a direct relationship as they represent the same chemical entity with significant health implications.
